title: Sembcorp Is in Discussions to Buy Australia’s Alinta Energy
description: Singapore’s Sembcorp Industries Ltd. said it’s in talks to potentially buy Australian utility Alinta Energy Pty.
content: Singapore’s Sembcorp Industries Ltd. said it’s in talks to potentially buy Australian utility Alinta Energy Pty.
